amendment.description: To add provisions relating to acquisition of Federal land under the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3210, under the order of 4/13/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 63. Record Vote Number: 50.

action.text: Amendment SA 3210 proposed by Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2188-2189; text: CR S2188-2189) To add provisions relating to acquisition of Federal land under the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3210, under the order of 4/13/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 63. Record Vote Number: 50.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3210, under the order of 4/13/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 63. Record Vote Number: 50.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3210 proposed by Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 2953.
